title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 363.7 - Maximum employee contribution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 363.7 - Maximum employee contribution

State Regulations
(a) In accordance with Workers' Compensation Law section 209(3)(b), the superintendent shall set the maximum employee contribution on or before June 1, 2017 and annually thereafter on or before September 1. (b) Collection of the maximum employee contribution shall be done in accordance with the requirements set forth in Workers' Compensation Law section 209. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register May 31, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 22, eff. 5/31/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
